'''WORK IN PROGRESS'''

This page provides a list of other upstream projects whose translations are imported into Ubuntu and links to content describing how to contribute back.

=== XFCE ===
* <nowiki>[[XFCE]]</nowiki>
* http://i18n.xfce.org
* Note: from Jaunty onwards XFCE packages were moved to the `universe` repository and are no longer translatable in Launchpad

=== The Translation Project ===
* <nowiki>[[TranslationProject]]</nowiki>
* http://translationproject.org

=== Pidgin ===
* <nowiki>[[Pidgin]]</nowiki>
* Stats page: http://developer.pidgin.im/l10n/

=== Fedora ===
* <nowiki>[[Fedora]]</nowiki>
* http://translate.fedoraproject.org
* Also hosting the following upstream project
** avahi
** pam
** passwd
** pam_krb5
** packagekit
** pulseaudio
** system-config-printer
** virt-manager
